author: bodewig
msg: Added usefile attribute to <formatter> to allow testoutput to be sent
to stdout instead of a file.

author: bodewig
msg: Moved ${} expansion and task evaluation to runtime.
This has a lot of consequences, most notably those listed in
WHATSNEW. This also affects the behavior of several other tasks like
<available> who will now do their job at runtime instead of parser
I've changed the version number in build.xml to reflect this bigger

author: bodewig
msg: Removed some unused files and added a pointer to the mailing list

author: conor
msg: Task to perform JSP compiles using Weblogic's JSPC compiler.
